model_answer:
The correct answer is D: Event 7: Using the Broadcast Gameplay screen (with title/quality set and invite/share options) to initiate the Twitch broadcast from PlayStation.

This event initiates the process of streaming gameplay to Twitch directly from the PlayStation. The other events are necessary but do not directly enable the live status on Twitch.

The correct answer is D: Event 1: Launching Warzone and pressing X to start.

When you launch Warzone and press X to start a broadcast, the gameplay area will be reduced to allow space for the overlay and comment area to appear. This is because the overlay and comment area take up part of the screen space that would otherwise be used by the gameplay area.
